00020 
00021 
00027 // required file
00028 require '../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00029 require '../member_session.inc.php';
00030 session_start();
00031 
00032 if (isset($_POST['ajaxsec_user'])) {
00033     $ajaxsec_user = $_POST['ajaxsec_user'];
00034 }
00035 
00036 if (isset($_POST['ajaxsec_passwd'])) {
00037     $ajaxsec_passwd = $_POST['ajaxsec_passwd'];
00038 }
00039 
00040 if (($ajaxsec_user == $sysconf['ajaxsec_user']) AND ($ajaxsec_passwd == $sysconf['ajaxsec_passwd'])) {
00041     if ($sysconf['ajaxsec_ip_enabled'] == '1') {
00042         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'] == $sysconf['ajaxsec_ip_allowed']) {
00043             die();
00044         }
00045     }
00046     if (isset($_POST['id'])) {
00047         $id = intval($_POST['id']);
00048         $attachment_q = $dbs->query('SELECT att.*, f.* FROM biblio_attachment AS att
00049             LEFT JOIN files AS f ON att.file_id=f.file_id WHERE att.biblio_id='.$id.' AND att.access_type=\'public\' LIMIT 20');
00050         if ($attachment_q->num_rows < 1) {
00051             echo '<strong style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">'.__('No Attachment').'</strong>';
00052         } else {
00053             echo '<ul class="attachList">';
00054             while ($attachment_d = $attachment_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00055                 // check member type privileges
00056                 if ($attachment_d['access_limit']) {
00057                     if (utility::isMemberLogin()) {
00058                         $allowed_mem_types = @unserialize($attachment_d['access_limit']);
00059                         if (!in_array($_SESSION['m_member_type_id'], $allowed_mem_types)) {
00060                             continue;
00061                         }
00062                     } else {
00063                         continue;
00064                     }
00065                 }
00066                 if (preg_match('@(video|audio|image)/.+@i', $attachment_d['mime_type'])) {
00067                     echo '<li style="list-style-image: url(images/labels/auvi.png)"><strong><a href="#" title="Click to Play, Listen or View" onclick="openHTMLpop(\'index.php?p=multimediastream&fid='.$attachment_d['file_id'].'&bid='.$attachment_d['biblio_id'].'\', 400, 300, \''.$attachment_d['file_title'].'\')">'.$attachment_d['file_title'].'</a></strong>';
00068                     echo '<div><i>'.$attachment_d['file_desc'].'</i></div>';
00069                     if (trim($attachment_d['file_url']) != '') { echo '<div><a href="'.trim($attachment_d['file_url']).'" title="Other Resource Link" target="_blank">Other Resource Link</a></div>'; }
00070                     echo '</li>';
00071                 } else if ($attachment_d['mime_type'] == 'text/uri-list') {
00072                     echo '<li style="list-style-image: url(images/labels/url.png)"><strong><a href="'.trim($attachment_d['file_url']).'" title="Click to open link" target="_blank">'.$attachment_d['file_title'].'</a><div>'.$attachment_d['file_desc'].'</div></strong></li>';
00073                 } else {
00074                     echo '<li style="list-style-image: url(images/labels/ebooks.png)"><strong><a title="Click To View File" href="index.php?p=fstream&fid='.$attachment_d['file_id'].'&bid='.$attachment_d['biblio_id'].'" target="_blank">'.$attachment_d['file_title'].'</a></strong>';
00075                     if (trim($attachment_d['file_url']) != '') { echo ' [<a href="'.trim($attachment_d['file_url']).'" title="Other Resource related to this file" target="_blank" style="font-size: 90%;">Other Resource Link</a>]'; }
00076                     echo '<div><i>'.$attachment_d['file_desc'].'</i></div></li>';
00077                 }
00078             }
00079             echo '</ul>';
00080         }
00081     }
00082 }
00083 ?>
